title: African American Cultural Images
description: Comparative study of the cultural representations of, and counter-representations by, American racial/ethnic groups in American popular opinion and consciousness, with particular emphasis on African Americans. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for Comparative Ethnic Studies majors. Fulfills USCP.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and two lower division courses in Area D
recommended: ES 112 (D1) and/or ES D3 courses; Junior standing
